The [[Strength of a Hundred Seal]] - which takes the form of a diamond on the user's forehead - is used to gradually build up and store the user's [[chakra]] over time.<ref>''[[Jin no Sho]]'', page 279</ref> Yin Seal: Release opens that seal, giving the user access to the accumulated chakra. Upon release, a pattern starts to appear from the diamond shape,<ref name="d2"/> spreading out across their forehead and potentially the rest of their body;<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 577</ref> by spreading the seal's pattern to another, the user can transfer the seal's chakra to them instead.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 685</ref> The stored chakra amounts to far more than what the user has on their own, allowing them to perform chakra-demanding [[jutsu]] that they wouldn't be able to use otherwise, such as [[Creation Rebirth]].<ref name="d2"/> If not all of the chakra ends up being used, it can be stored in a new Strength of a Hundred Seal.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 171, page 7</ref>
